text: @RepDougCollins I thought Donnie said this was all a hoax. Do you mean COVID19 is real and not just something made up for a Michael Crichton book? Crap, Siri...order hand sanitizer. Siri...order Soap...Siri? Alexa, tell siri to order soup. #TomCottonIdeas
